sources.title: Sahara (1943) Humphrey Bogart Â· Bruce Bennett
sources.description: Humphrey Bogart fights for survival in the desert in 1942... War drama

metadata.Plot: Sergeant Joe Gunn and his tank crew pick up five British soldiers, a Frenchman and a Sudanese man with an Italian prisoner crossing the Libyan Desert to rejoin their command after the fall of Tobruk. They and the Germans are greatly in need of water.
metadata.Writer: John Howard Lawson, Zoltan Korda, James O'Hanlon
metadata.Actors: Humphrey Bogart, Bruce Bennett, J. Carrol Naish
